@lldlls  if u tell me what device (ipod, iphone, psp ect) ur using then its easier for me to help you....

@lldlls First u need to find some subs and then use SrtiPhone 1.0 to convert the SRT file to a normal txt file so ur iphone can read it. then place the txt file in the same folder as the movie with the same name then u can add it to the movie under settings on ur iphone while playing the movie.
